listing.description: A rare opportunity to purchase a superb four bedroom, custom designed triplex apartment set on floors 44,45 and 46 of Manchesters most iconic building, The Beetham Tower. Offering approximately 4,950 sq ft of beautifully presented accommodation having been recently refurbished throughout. This ultra-modern, open plan apartment simply oozes style and sophistication.Entering the apartment from the main entrance on the 45th level you will be greeted by the luxury curved reception hallway taking in the polished marble tiled flooring and fashionable Wenge stained timber. Opening out to the open plan living area, modern kitchen fully fitted with high specification appliances and dining area, all with uninterrupted panoramic views of Manchester city centre from the floor to ceiling windows. This floor further features hidden utility room, contemporary designed WC and internal terrace just off the lounge area.On the upper level, (floor 46) from the spiral staircase you will discover the master bedroom suite benefitting from internal terrace, dressing room and en-suite bathroom. Bedrooms two and three can also be found on this floor along with the family bathroom suite featuring his and hers hand wash basins, low level WC, walk-in shower and bath with fully tiled surround.The lower level (floor 44) features the home cinema room with internal terrace, bedroom four, home office and large dressing room with custom designed fitted storage units. This level also benefits from WC, store and cloaks room.This spectacular apartment further benefits from five underground allocated car park spaces, smart home tech air conditioning and a CCTV security system. EPC rating C.The Beetham Tower, Manchester’s second tallest building and premier apartment complex. Located in the heart of the city, the multi-award winning landmark development, which was designed by world renowned architects SimpsonHaugh & Partners, has soared over the city centre for a decade.Its exceptional location at 301 Deansgate - the city’s main thoroughfare – is also home to the Hilton Manchester Deansgate hotel and Cloud 23 ‘sky bar’, and provides access to countless amenities including shops & leisure, health & wellbeing facilities, bars & restaurants, museums & galleries etc., as well as excellent transport links. This is aspirational living at its finest!Floor 45Curved Reception Hall 17'0 (5.18m) x 13'0 (3.96m)Cloak/WCLiving Room 28'0 (8.53m) x 28'0 (8.53m)Dining Kitchen 28'0 (8.53m) x 16'5 (5m)Utility Room 10'0 (3.05m) x 6'0 (1.83m)Floor 46Bedroom One 19'5 (5.92m) x 15'0 (4.57m)En-suite BathroomDressing Room 11'5 (3.48m) x 7'0 (2.13m)Bedroom Two 16'6 (5.03m) x 11'0 (3.35m)Dressing RoomBedroom Three 17'7 (5.36m) x 11'9 (3.58m)BathroomFloor 44Cinema Room 19'3 (5.87m) x 9'7 (2.92m)Home Office 14'2 (4.32m) x 11'4 (3.45m)Dressing Room 22'6 (6.86m) x 9'3 (2.82m)Studio/Playroom 25'10 (7.87m) x 19'6 (5.94m)Cloaks/WCimportant note to purchasers:We endeavour to make our sales particulars accurate and reliable, however, they do not constitute or form part of an offer or any contract and none is to be relied upon as statements of representation or fact. Any services, systems and appliances listed in this specification have not been tested by us and no guarantee as to their operating ability or efficiency is given. All measurements have been taken as a guide to prospective buyers only, and are not precise. Please be advised that some of the particulars may be awaiting vendor approval. If you require clarification or further information on any points, please contact us, especially if you are travelling some distance to view.Fixtures and fittings other than those mentioned are to be agreed with the seller.
listing.short_description: A rare opportunity to purchase a superb four bedroom, custom designed triplex apartment set on floors 44,45 and 46 of Manchesters most iconic building, The Beetham Tower. Offering approximately 4,950 sq ft of beautifully presented accommodation having been recently refurbished throughout. This ultra-modern, open plan apartment simply oozes style and sophistication.  Entering the apartment from the main entrance on the 45th level you will be greeted by the luxury curved reception hallway taking in the polished marble tiled flooring and fashionable Wenge stained timber. Opening out to the open plan living area, modern kitchen fully fitted with high specification appliances and dining area, all with uninterrupted panoramic views of Manchester city centre from the floor to ceiling windows. This floor further features hidden utility room, contemporary designed WC and internal terrace just off the lounge area.  On the upper level, (floor 46) from the spiral staircase you will discover the master bedroom suite benefitting from internal terrace, dressing room and en-suite bathroom. Bedrooms two and three can also be found on this floor along with the family bathroom suite featuring his and hers hand wash basins, low level WC, walk-in shower and bath with fully tiled surround.  The lower level (floor 44) features the home cinema room with internal terrace, bedroom four, home office and large dressing room with custom designed fitted storage units. This level also benefits from WC, store and cloaks room.  This spectacular apartment further benefits from five underground allocated car park spaces, smart home tech air conditioning and a CCTV security system. EPC rating C.  The Beetham Tower, Manchester’s second tallest building and premier apartment complex. Located in the heart of the city, the multi-award winning landmark development, which was designed by world renowned architects SimpsonHaugh & Partners, has soared over the city centre for a decade.  Its exceptional location at 301 Deansgate - the city’s main thoroughfare – is also home to the Hilton Manchester Deansgate hotel and Cloud 23 ‘sky bar’, and provides access to countless amenities including shops & leisure, health & wellbeing facilities, bars & restaurants, museums & galleries etc., as well as excellent transport links. This is aspirational living at its finest!  Floor 45 Curved Reception Hall 17'0 (5.18m) x 13'0 (3.96m) Cloak/WC Living Room 28'0 (8.53m) x 28'0 (8.53m) Dining Kitchen 28'0 (8.53m) x 16'5 (5m) Utility Room 10'0 (3.05m) x 6'0 (1.83m)  Floor 46 Bedroom One 19'5 (5.92m) x 15'0 (4.57m) En-suite Bathroom Dressing Room 11'5 (3.48m) x 7'0 (2.13m) Bedroom Two 16'6 (5.03m) x 11'0 (3.35m) Dressing Room Bedroom Three 17'7 (5.36m) x 11'9 (3.58m) Bathroom  Floor 44 Cinema Room 19'3 (5.87m) x 9'7 (2.92m) Home Office 14'2 (4.32m) x 11'4 (3.45m) Dressing Room 22'6 (6.86m) x 9'3 (2.82m) Studio/Playroom 25'10 (7.87m) x 19'6 (5.94m) Cloaks/WC  important note to purchasers:  We endeavour to make our sales particulars accurate and reliable, however, they do not constitute or form part of an offer or any contract and none is to be relied upon as statements of representation or fact. Any services, systems and appliances listed in this specification have not been tested by us and no guarantee as to their operating ability or efficiency is given. All measurements have been taken as a guide to prospective buyers only, and are not precise. Please be advised that some of the particulars may be awaiting vendor approval. If you require clarification or further information on any points, please contact us, especially if you are travelling some distance to view.  Fixtures and fittings other than those mentioned are to be agreed with the seller.

listing.short_description:
This iconic tower boasts 28 storeys of uninterrupted views across the city and beyond as well as being home to Manchester’s two most exclusive penthouses. Named to highlight its unique and central location at the axis point to this great city’s major transport links, Central Business District, famous shopping offer, and key attractions, Axis Tower has become one of Manchester’s most sought after places to live.

Penthouse

Elevation - City, Quays & Cheshire

Investment Highlights

+ Manchester Skyscraper + High Rental Yields + Europe's Largest LED screen on the façade + Located in Deansgate + The most exclusive penthouses in the City + Five star concierge service + High end modern living + Designed by award-winning Architects

Decription

We are proud to present Axis Tower, one of Manchester’s most anticipated developments. This iconic tower boasts 28 stories of uninterrupted views across the city and beyond as well as being home to Manchester’s two most exclusive penthouses. Named to highlight its unique and central location at the axis point to this great city’s major transport links, Central Business District, famous shopping offer, and key attractions, Axis Tower has become one of Manchester’s most sought after places to live. Axis Tower is expected to be complete in Q4 2019 and will have 173 Luxury apartments, made up of a range of 1,2 and 3 bedroom choices with a variety of en-suite and family bathroom configurations, all with co-ordinated ambience depicting a modern lifestyle. Open plan galley kitchen/ living room and en-suite bedrooms.

Tenure

The apartments will be leasehold, with a 125 year lease. There will be a service charge of approximately £2.70 per sq ft per annum. Ground rent is payable annually in advance for each apartment. (£275/1 Bed; £350/2 Bed; £425/3 Bed)

Payment Process

1. A £5,000 deposit is payable upon reservation of an apartment 2. 30% of the purchase price is payable upon exchange of contracts, approximately 1 month after reservation paid (minus the reservation fee) 3. Balance of 70% is payable upon project completion

listing.description: The Penthouse 360 Building. Total floor area of approximately 4780 Sq. Ft. A labour of love, a vision of creating arguably one of the best living spaces with no expense spared in the city centre. Several architect plans were commissioned with the best one chosen to create an inspired, spacious, and highly comfortable home that's the last word in both luxury & privacy. Not just internally but also harnessing the phenomenal views of The City of Manchester, The Town Hall, Salford, Media City, & Castlefield Basin. Consisting of: Key access only lift, lobby / gym area, Grand entrance hallway, WC, Living area measuring close to 50 ft. Bespoke circular kitchen, additional laundry kitchen. The Cheshire room is quiet, peaceful and relaxing with handmade av furniture. Three luxury bedrooms and double en-suites. The Master having a handmade dressing room. External private terrace and a balcony. Climate control system controlled room-by-room offering both air con & heat with slot diffusers that are flush providing the ideal climate throughout the year. Electric blind spurs are fitted throughout. Highly insulated and sound proofed. A quiet oasis within the city.The Penthouse 360Total floor size approximately 4780 ftThree double size bedroomsEn-suite bespoke dressing roomEn-suite wet room & BathroomPrivate Terrace & BalconyBespoke designer Circular kitchenLaundry kitchen / utilityClimate Control / Cat 5 cabling +2 Cisco Wi-Fi spotsEntire top floorLift x . The lift uses a key to gain access to the Penthouse and opens in the lobby.Private Lobby / Gym  x . Double glazed window. Porcelain tiled flooring, painted plaster ceiling, ceiling light and a gym area. Video entry system.Control x . A control hub to adjust the climate, lighting and a police connected alarm system by adt. The climate control is by Daikin and easy to use LCD panel help to you create your ideal climate. Cat 5 cabling throughout with outlets in 6 rooms.Wardrobe x . Custom built fitted comprising of a double wardrobe providing handy storage on arrival.Storage Cupboard x . Bespoke storage cupboard.Grand Hall x . Climate control, Tedd Todd engineered classic wide oak flooring, painted plaster ceiling, spotlights and ceiling light. Access to the terrace. Total closure light switch with multiple mains points.WC One x . Created by Porcelanosa with tiled flooring, painted plaster ceiling, ceiling light. Concealed cistern WC.Living Room33'1" x 48'9" (10.08m x 14.86m). An extraordinary living area measuring nearly 50 ft. Sliding double glazed door, opening onto the terrace. Double aspect double glazed windows facing the rear and side with views. Air conditioning, solid oak flooring, painted plaster ceiling. A bespoke circular kitchen by Earle and Ginger of Didsbury. Fitted wall and base units with a circular cooking island, single sink and with mixer tap, integrated, electric oven, integrated, induction hob, overhead retractable extractor, and integrated slim line dishwasher, Amtico flooring offering amazing views over the Castlefield Fort and Basin. Multiple phone, Ethernet and mains points. Bespoke Walnut doors from Spain with Karcher handles.Kitchen8'11" x 10'9" (2.72m x 3.28m). A second fitted kitchen / utility room used for laundry and food storage, painted plaster ceiling, spotlights. Corian work surface, fitted and wall and base units, stainless steel sink and with mixer tap, integrated dishwasher, integrated washer dryer. Amtico flooring.Cheshire Room15'8" x 24'6" (4.78m x 7.47m). Double glazed window. Climate control, Cormar Sensations carpeted flooring, painted plaster ceiling, spotlights and feature LED lighting with a socket suitable for a chandelier.. Bespoke joinery by Oakleigh Bespoke Cabinet Makers who created this one of a kind piece of furniture to house a widescreen 4K TV. Incorporating a Gasco fire with flame and flame plus heat setting. A bright airy room that is quiet, peaceful and relaxing. Could be also a cinema room.Master Bedroom One20'5" x 19' (6.22m x 5.8m). Double bedroom; double aspect double glazed windows facing the side, Cormar Sensations carpeted flooring, painted plaster ceiling, recessed lighting and feature light. Climate control and LED lighting with ample phone, Ethernet and mains points. Bespoke Walnut door from Spain with Karcher handles.Dressing Room8' x 18'3" (2.44m x 5.56m). An elegant room created with attention to detail .Climate control, Cormar Sensations carpeted flooring, fitted wardrobes, by Oakleigh Bespoke Cabinet Makers of Altrincham, painted plaster ceiling, LED feature lighting.Bathroom x . A room created by Porcelanosa with a bespoke frosted glass entrance door, soft and slow close and opening mechanism made by Cheshire Glass. Featuring privacy glass screen this provides the ultimate in privacy. Luxury tiled flooring with under floor heating, painted plaster ceiling, and LED ceiling spotlights. Wall mounted sink, shaving point, 1300mm Royal Reflex cabinet / mirror. The freestanding bath was positioned to take advantage of the City's skyline with a view of The Beetham Tower.Wet Room x . Incorporated with the bathroom with tiled flooring, painted plaster ceiling, spotlights. Power shower and wet room. Created by Porcelanosa.WC x . Porcelonosa tiled flooring, tiled walls, painted plaster ceiling, spotlights. Close coupled WC, wall-mounted sink, extractor fan.Bedroom Two16'9" x 12'5" (5.1m x 3.78m). Double bedroom; double glazed window. Climate control, painted plaster ceiling feature LED lighting. Multiple phone, Ethernet and mains points. Steps lead up to custom made wardrobe providing excellent storage. Bespoke Walnut door from Spain with Karcher handles.Shower Room x . A touch of luxury by Porcelanosa with a heated towel rail, tiled flooring, tiled walls, painted plaster ceiling, spotlights. Concealed cistern WC, walk-in shower, wall-mounted sink, extractor fan and shaving point. 800 mm Royal Reflex mirror cabinet with Bella Vista cosmetic mirror in Chrome. Under floor heating.Bedroom 3 / Home Office16'8" x 13'2" (5.08m x 4.01m). Bespoke Walnut door from Spain with Karcher handles .UPVC sliding double glazed door, opening onto the private terrace. Double glazed window. Climate control, Cormar Sensationscarpeted flooring, painted plaster ceiling, spotlights Phone, Ethernet and mains points. Classed as the third bedroom but suitable as a great office / study.Balcony x . A balcony with blue outdoor multi coloured LED strip lighting, spot lighting with dimmer switch. Views towards Castlefireld, Salford Quays, Media City UK and Manchester United.Private Terrace36'9" x 11'10" (11.2m x 3.6m). A superb full with private terrace with out door LED lighting and feature flooring. Offering a superb out door space with unobstructed views of Salford, the city centre and far reaching views towards the countryside. With outdoor mains points.

This iconic tower boasts 28 storeys of uninterrupted views across the city and beyond as well as being home to Manchester’s two most exclusive penthouses. Named to highlight its unique and central location at the axis point to this great city’s major transport links, Central Business District, famous shopping offer, and key attractions, Axis Tower has become one of Manchester’s most sought after places to live.

Penthouse

Elevation - City, Cheshire & Peaks

Investment Highlights

+ Manchester Skyscraper + High Rental Yields + Europe's Largest LED screen on the façade + Located in Deansgate + The most exclusive penthouses in the City + Five star concierge service + High end modern living + Designed by award-winning Architects

Decription

We are proud to present Axis Tower, one of Manchester’s most anticipated developments. This iconic tower boasts 28 stories of uninterrupted views across the city and beyond as well as being home to Manchester’s two most exclusive penthouses. Named to highlight its unique and central location at the axis point to this great city’s major transport links, Central Business District, famous shopping offer, and key attractions, Axis Tower has become one of Manchester’s most sought after places to live. Axis Tower is expected to be complete in Q4 2019 and will have 173 Luxury apartments, made up of a range of 1,2 and 3 bedroom choices with a variety of en-suite and family bathroom configurations, all with co-ordinated ambience depicting a modern lifestyle. Open plan galley kitchen/ living room and en-suite bedrooms.

Tenure

The apartments will be leasehold, with a 125 year lease. There will be a service charge of approximately £2.70 per sq ft per annum. Ground rent is payable annually in advance for each apartment. (£275/1 Bed; £350/2 Bed; £425/3 Bed)

Payment Process

1. A £5,000 deposit is payable upon reservation of an apartment 2. 30% of the purchase price is payable upon exchange of contracts, approximately 1 month after reservation paid (minus the reservation fee) 3. Balance of 70% is payable upon project completion

listing.description: Hunters are delighted to offer for sale this simply stunning and truly unique double sized apartment. The property has been remastered and remodelled to the highest specification and is located on the sixth floor of one of Manchester's most prestigious developments; No.1 Deansgate. The apartment was designed by architects and boasts Lutron lighting throughout controlled local and via mobile phone app, German underfloor heating & Nu-Heat controlled with App. Real hardwood floors, Handmade full length Maple doors throughout, handmade wardrobes in all 3 bedrooms, Villroy & Boch bathroom suites / Toto bathroom suites and mirrors, Hansgrohe shower with bath fittings, handmade Italian tiles, approximately 1851 square feet of living space, Light and spacious throughout as there is 3 sides of windows, the apartment comprises of an entrance hallway, open plan lounge / Remp Kitchen with Miele cookers and hob, Lieber fridge, freezers, wine cooler, dish washer, dining room, master bedroom with en-suite, second bedroom with en-suite, third double bedroom and a bathroom suite. Two buffer zones that have views of Deansgate and Manchester city centre, a full wall of windows with stunning views overlooking Manchester Cathedral, The National Football Museum and the property provides fantastic 180+ degree views. Also included is 2 parking spaces very close to the lift, and a 24 hour concierge. Viewings are available upon request.Entrance halllounge8m (26' 3") x 7.2m (23' 7")kitchendining areamaster bedroom5m (16' 5") x 2.9m (9' 6")ensuite2.5m (8' 2") x 3m (9' 10")bedroom 24.4m (14' 5") x 3.8m (12' 6")ensuite2.39m (7' 10") x 2.21m (7' 3")bedroom 33.4m (11' 2") x 3.2m (10' 6")bathroombuffer zonebuffer zoneview

listing.description: Located in close proximity to Eccles town centre and in close proximity to Manchester city centre with excellent transport links nearby. The closest metro station is only 0.5miles form the site with trams going through Salford, the City Centre, East Manchester all the way through to Ashton Under Lyne.The site was previously used as a sports club. The development has got for 48 two bedroom apartment arranged over three floors with associated parking and communal spaces.

listing.description: A stunning four bedroom apartment in one of the most sought after, luxurious developments in Manchester. Located on the 31st floor the apartment has stunning views to 3 aspects and has been custom designed by the current owners. With 1600 sqft of living space, the apartment briefly comprises; four double bedrooms, three fully fitted modern bathrooms, a huge open plan living/kitchen space with access onto the South Facing winter garden. The bespoke kitchen and living area has a raised ceiling to allow room for the tall kitchen units and adds to the spacious feel from the apartment, it also includes a large island which is perfect for a family or entertaining. The development has a 24hr concierge, comes with super fast WiFi, an integrated sound system and includes two underground parking spaces.IntroductionBeetham Tower, 301 Deansgate remains the most iconic building in Manchester City Centre, standing 47 storeys high at the Southerly end of Deansgate. This penthouse apartment is located on the 31st floor on the Eastern elevation of the building, thereby offering unparalleled views to South, East and North elevations, therefore enjoying the sunlight for most of the day.The development is entered via secure communal entrance with 24 hour concierge service.Open Plan Living Area (27'05 x 19'07 (8.36m x 5.97m))This impressive corner position living area benefits from dual aspect views over the City and beyond, from its feature floor to ceiling windows, with wooden flooring, TV, satellite and phone points. The apartment benefits from a wet electric heating system, with a panelled radiator in the living area. Sliding double glazed doors open out on to the internal terrace.This fully glazed 'winter garden' runs the full width of the apartment and has truly spectacular views to the South.Bespoke KitchenRecently refurbished to an extremely high standard this large kitchen area is fitted with a boast of built in appliances and an additional island which is perfect for a social lifestyle or family. The white goods include 2x De Dietrich ovens and separate microwave, De Detrich induction hob with downdraft extractor, 2x aeg fitted fridges, 2x aeg fitted freezers, aeg dishwasher, 2x cda wine fridges and a stainless Steel sunken sink with hose tap. listing.short_description:
A stunning four bedroom apartment in one of the most sought after, luxurious developments in Manchester. Located on the 31st floor the apartment has stunning views to 3 aspects and has been custom designed by the current owners. With 1600 sqft of living space, the apartment briefly comprises; four double bedrooms, three fully fitted modern bathrooms, a huge open plan living/kitchen space with access onto the South Facing winter garden. The bespoke kitchen and living area has a raised ceiling to allow room for the tall kitchen units and adds to the spacious feel from the apartment, it also includes a large island which is perfect for a family or entertaining. The development has a 24hr concierge, comes with super fast WiFi, an integrated sound system and includes two underground parking spaces.

Introduction

Beetham Tower, 301 Deansgate remains the most iconic building in Manchester City Centre, standing 47 storeys high at the Southerly end of Deansgate. This penthouse apartment is located on the 31st floor on the Eastern elevation of the building, thereby offering unparalleled views to South, East and North elevations, therefore enjoying the sunlight for most of the day. The development is entered via secure communal entrance with 24 hour concierge service.

Open Plan Living Area (27'05 x 19'07 (8.36m x 5.97m))

This impressive corner position living area benefits from dual aspect views over the City and beyond, from its feature floor to ceiling windows, with wooden flooring, TV, satellite and phone points. The apartment benefits from a wet electric heating system, with a panelled radiator in the living area. Sliding double glazed doors open out on to the internal terrace. This fully glazed 'winter garden' runs the full width of the apartment and has truly spectacular views to the South.

Bespoke Kitchen

Recently refurbished to an extremely high standard this large kitchen area is fitted with a boast of built in appliances and an additional island which is perfect for a social lifestyle or family. The white goods include 2x De Dietrich ovens and separate microwave, De Detrich induction hob with downdraft extractor, 2x aeg fitted fridges, 2x aeg fitted freezers, aeg dishwasher, 2x cda wine fridges and a stainless Steel sunken sink with hose tap. Ample storage space with heightened ceilings to allow extra tall units.

Master Bedroom (22'11 x 16'10 (6.99m x 5.13m))

Beautiful corner position bedroom with feature floor to ceiling windows and enjoying dual aspect views to both the North and East elevations, wooden flooring, 4 sliding door fitted wardrobes, downlighting, TV and phone points, sliding door to the 4th bedroom which could be used as a study/dressing area and a further door to the en-suite bathroom.

Master En-Suite Bathroom (8'02 x 5'07 (2.49m x 1.70m))

Accessed via the master bedroom the en-suite bathroom comprises a three piece white bathroom suite, wall mounted vanity mirror with fitted shelving unit, heated towel rail, partially tiled walls, tiled flooring and spotlights.

Bedroom Two

Double bedroom with floor to ceiling windows, carpeted, built in wardrobes, TV, satellite points, door to en-suite, wall mounted electric radiator.

En-Suite (7'05 x 3'11 (2.26m x 1.19m))

Accessed via the second bedroom the en-suite comprises walk in shower, sink with mixer tap, WC, wall mirror with built in shelving, heated towel rail, partially tiles walls, tiled flooring and spotlights.

Bedroom Three (11'05 x 9'10 (3.48m x 3.00m))

Double bedroom with floor to ceiling windows, carpeted, built in fitted wardrobes, TV, satellite and electrical points, wall mounted electric radiator.

Bedroom Four/Study (11'05 x 7'08 (3.48m x 2.34m))

Access via the hallway or a sliding door from the master bedroom this bedroom is currently used as a study. Floor to ceiling windows, wooden flooring, ceiling spotlights, wall mounted radiator.

Bathroom (8'02 x 5'09 (2.49m x 1.75m))

Recently refurbished with a walk-in rain shower, sink with mixer tap, WC, heated towel rail, fully tiled walls and flooring, ceiling spotlights, tiled vanity shelf.

Balcony (27'12 x 5'00 (8.53m x 1.52m))

Stunning full length 'winter garden' overlooking South Manchester, decked flooring, speakers and patio heaters included.

Outside

24hr concierge, two underground parking spaces which are side by side.

Leasehold

Length of Lease- 989 years remaining Service Charge- Approx £500 per month Ground Rent- £500 per annum- £2400 per annum for Building insurance

These particulars are for general information only and do not constitute any part of an offer or contract. All statements contained therein are made without responsibility on the part of the vendors or lessors and are not to be relied upon as statement or representation of fact. Intending purchasers or lessees must satisfy themselves, by inspection, or otherwise, as to the correctness of each of the statements or dimensions contained in these particulars.
